cs213.photoAlbum.control

Class PhotoControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.control.PhotoControl

  • public final class PhotoControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods to create, delete, manipulate, and analyze Photo objects.
    Author:
    Ben Green

    • Method Detail

      • addPhoto

        public static void addPhoto(UserInterface current_user,
            java.lang.String filename,
            java.lang.String caption,
            java.lang.String album_name)
        Add photo to existing album. Reports errors if necessary.
        Parameters:
        current_user - Specified user
        filename - Specified photo's filename
        caption - Specified caption (can be null)
        album_name - Specified photo's containing album

      • movePhoto

        public static void movePhoto(UserInterface current_user,
             java.lang.String filename,
             java.lang.String old_album,
             java.lang.String new_album)
        Move photo from one album to another. Reports errors if necessary.
        Parameters:
        current_user - Specified user
        filename - Specified photo's filename
        old_album - Album the photo currently resides in
        new_album - Album to move the photo to

      • removePhoto

        public static void removePhoto(UserInterface current_user,
               java.lang.String filename,
               java.lang.String album_name)
        Removes photo from album. Reports errors if necessary.
        Parameters:
        current_user - Specified user
        filename - Specified photo's filename
        album_name - Specified photo's containing album

      • addTag

        public static void addTag(UserInterface current_user,
          java.lang.String filename,
          java.lang.String tag_type,
          java.lang.String tag_value)
        Add tag set containing a key and a value to the photo. Reports errors if necessary.
        Parameters:
        current_user - Specified user
        filename - Specified photo's filename
        tag_type - Tag type, can be null
        tag_value - Tag value, must be included

      • deleteTag

        public static void deleteTag(UserInterface current_user,
             java.lang.String filename,
             java.lang.String tag_type,
             java.lang.String tag_value)
        Remove tag from photo in user's library. Reports errors if necessary.
        Parameters:
        current_user - Specified user
        filename - Filename of specified photo
        tag_type - Tag type
        tag_value - Tag value

      • listPhotoInfo

        public static void listPhotoInfo(UserInterface current_user,
                 java.lang.String filename)
        Lists photo's information, including filename, album, date, caption, and tags
        Parameters:
        current_user - Specified user
        filename - Photo to analyze

      • getPhotosByDate

        public static void getPhotosByDate(UserInterface current_user,
                   java.lang.String start_date,
                   java.lang.String end_date)
        Prints list of a user's photos that contain timestamps within a specified range of dates
        Parameters:
        current_user - Specified user
        start_date - Beginning of date range in proper date_format format
        end_date - End of date range in proper date_format format

      • getPhotosByTag

        public static void getPhotosByTag(UserInterface current_user,
                  java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> parsed_cmd)
        Prints list of user's photos that share a tag, or possibly multiple tags
        Parameters:
        current_user - Specified user
        parsed_cmd - List of tag sets containing values and (optionally) keys, comma separated, with colons separating key/value pairs
